Title: Urvan
Description: ['An unnamed girl appears in a school. She traverses through a cyberpunk version of the town of Sasebo, collecting lanterns while being pursued by an ominous figure.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Hoozuki no Reitetsu', 'Side story: Hoozuki no Reitetsu OVA', 'Sequel: Hoozuki no Reitetsu 2nd Season']
